name: out1

procedures: T1005::[Out1] can copy files and Registry data from compromised hosts.
T1027::[Out1] has the ability to encode data.
T1059.003::[Out1] can use native command line for execution.
T1071.001::[Out1] can use HTTP and HTTPS in communications with remote hosts.
T1114.001::[Out1] can parse e-mails on a target machine.

description: [Out1](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0594) is a remote access tool written in python and used by [MuddyWater](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0069) since at least 2021.(Citation: Trend Micro Muddy Water March 2021)
